lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What country was Joseph taken to?
Why did Joseph have success at everything he did?
What job did Potiphar give Joseph? How did it work out?
answers: Put him in charge of his house, never had to worry about anything
Made him cook his food, but Joseph was bad at cooking
Had him plow the fields with the animals
Made him clean the palace floors, Joseph was good at it

questions.text: Who asked Joseph to commit adultery?
When Potiphar's wife grabbed onto Joseph, what did he do?
answers: Ran away, leaving his coat behind

questions.text: What did Potiphar's wife tell her husband?
answers: Joseph attacked her, she screamed, Joseph ran away

questions.text: What did Potiphar do with Joseph after listening to his wife's story?
How did things go for Joseph in prison?
answers: God was with him; was placed in charge of other prisoners
He became very sick and weak
He was never heard from again
